How To Use DiscHub Scalping Bot

Follow these steps to safely trade using our fully automated EMA scalping system.

Step 1: Prepare MT5

Install MetaTrader 5 on your computer and log in using either a Demo or Live account. MT5 must remain running while the bot is active.

  • ✔ MT5 installed and running
  • ✔ Logged in to your trading account on DiscHub bot
  • ✔ Stable internet connection
Step 2: Connect Account

Enter your MT5 Login ID, Password, and Server name to connect the bot to your trading account.

  • ✔ Account verified automatically
  • ✔ Connection confirmed before trading
  • ✔ Demo or Live mode detected
Step 3: Subscription Check

Live accounts require an active subscription before trading is allowed. Demo accounts always trade for free.

  • ✔ Demo accounts → free access
  • ✔ Live accounts → subscription required
  • ✔ Expired subscriptions block live trading

Subscription status is validated automatically before any live trade is placed.

Step 4: Configure Trading

Select the symbol you want to trade and define your risk settings before starting the bot.

  • ✔ Trading symbol (e.g. EURUSD)
  • ✔ Lot size control
  • ✔ Maximum open trades
Step 5: Automated Trading Strategy

DiscHub Scalping Bot operates fully automatically using a high precision strategy:

  • ✔ Lower timeframe entries on M1 timeframe
  • ✔ Higher timeframe trend confirmation
  • ✔ BUY and SELL positions
  • ✔ ATR based trailing stop loss

Once started, the bot manages trades without manual intervention.

Step 6: Stop the Bot

You can safely stop the bot at any time using one of the following methods:

  • ✔ Close the MT5 terminal
  • ✔ Remove or clear symbol settings
  • ✔ Stop the bot & shut down the system running the bot

No new trades will be opened once the bot is stopped.
